TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BindingContext extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供关于生成通道侦听器和通道工厂所需的地址、绑定、绑定元素和绑定参数的信息。

span.span: Provides information about the addresses, bindings, binding elements and binding parameters required to build the channel listeners and channel factories.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通道侦听器和通道工厂继而构造用于处理传入和传出消息的通道堆栈。The channel listeners and channel factories, in turn, construct the channel stacks used to process incoming and outgoing messages. 绑定上下文还提供到用于构造通道和侦听器堆栈的内部通道工厂和通道侦听器的链接。The binding context also provides the linkage to the inner channel factories and channel listeners that are used to construct the channel and listener stacks. 绑定上下文基本上存储了构造通道堆栈期间所需的全部动态信息。The binding context basically stores all of the dynamic information needed during the construction of the channel stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此集合保存从绑定生成通道堆栈时遇到的设置。This collection holds the settings encountered when building the channel stack from the bindings. 创建过程中需要压入通道堆栈的设置被放入集合中，直到堆栈中下方的通道需要这些设置。Settings that need to be pushed down the channel stack during creation are put into the collection until a channel lower in the stack needs them. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_BindingContext#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_bindingcontext/cs/program.cs#4)] [!code-vb[S_UE_BindingContext#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_bindingcontext/vb/program.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext Clone ();
.method public hidebysig instance class System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext Clone() cil managed
Public Function Clone () As BindingContext
public: System::ServiceModel::Channels::BindingContext ^ Clone();

summary.span: 返回当前通道生成上下文的副本。

span.span: Returns a copy of the current channel build context.

returns.span: 作为当前通道生成上下文副本的 对象。

span.span: A object that is a copy of the current channel build context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回作为绑定上下文的深层克隆的副本。This method returns a copy that is a deep clone of your binding context. 对象的深层克隆创建对象的副本以及该对象直接或间接引用的所有内容的副本。A deep clone of an object creates a copy of the object and a copy of everything directly or indirectly referenced by that object. （这也称为复制整个对象图。）相比之下，对象的浅表克隆只是对象本身的副本。(This is also called copying the entire object graph.) A shallow clone of an object, by contrast, is a copy of the object only. 如果对象包含对其他对象的引用，则浅表复制不创建所引用对象的副本，而是仅复制对原始对象的引用。If the object contains references to other objects, the shallow copy does not create copies of the referred objects; instead, it copies only the references to the original objects. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_BindingContext#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_bindingcontext/cs/program.cs#13)] [!code-vb[S_UE_BindingContext#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_bindingcontext/vb/program.vb#13)]

span.span: The typed object requested if it is present or if it is not.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 克隆绑定上下文，并对绑定上下文中存储的下一个绑定元素调用 。Clones the binding context and calls on the next binding element stored in the binding context. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_BindingContext#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_bindingcontext/cs/program.cs#14)] [!code-vb[S_UE_BindingContext#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_bindingcontext/vb/program.vb#14)]

summary.span: 获取其他绑定元素用于构造通道堆栈的绑定元素。

span.span: Gets the binding elements that are used by other binding elements to construct the channel stack.

value.span: ，包含其他绑定元素用于构造通道堆栈的绑定元素。

span.span: The that contains the binding elements that are used by other binding elements to construct the channel stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 放入此集合的绑定元素，是不与任何通道堆栈中的侦听器或工厂直接对应的元素。The binding elements that are put into this collection are those elements that do not correspond directly to a listener or factory in one of the channel stacks. 例如，编码器绑定元素最终进入此集合，然后由传输通道用于构造消息编码器。The encoder binding element, for example, ends up in this collection and is then used by the transport channel to construct a message encoder. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_BindingContext#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_bindingcontext/cs/program.cs#8)] [!code-vb[S_UE_BindingContext#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_bindingcontext/vb/program.vb#8)]
